fullText: This musical about stranded airline passengers after 9/11 achieves something close to a miracle: It conjures the possibility of genuine human kindness without insulting your intelligence.
dtliExcerpt: This musical about stranded airline passengers after 9/11 achieves something close to a miracle: It conjures the possibility of genuine human kindness without insulting your intelligence.
